scripts.pretest: if exist cypress\reports; then rmdir /S/Q cypress\reports; fi;
scripts.cy:gui:stable:regression_test:school_api: cypress open --browser chrome -e tags="@stable_test and @regression_test and @localhost_test",environmentName=staging
scripts.cy:headless:stable:regression_test:schoo: cypress run --browser chrome -e tags="@stable_test and @regression_test and @localhost_test",environmentName=staging
scripts.cy:gui:stable:regression_test:school_api: cypress open --browser chrome -e tags="@stable_test and @regression_test and @school_api_test",environmentName=local
scripts.cy:gui:stable:regression_test:prio_0_sta: cypress open --browser chrome -e tags="@stable_test and @regression_test and @staging_test and @prio_0_staging",environmentName=staging
scripts.cy:gui:stable:regression_test:prio_0_dev: cypress open --browser chrome -e tags="@stable_test and @regression_test and @school_api_test and @prio_0_dev",environmentName=local
scripts.cy:gui:stable:regression_test:school_api: cypress open --browser chrome -e tags="@stable_test and @regression_test and @school_api_test and @pre_check_test",environmentName=local
scripts.cy:headless:stable:regression_test:schoo: cypress run --browser chrome -e tags="@stable_test and @regression_test and @school_api_test and @pre_check_test",environmentName=local
scripts.cy:gui:stable:pr:school_api_test:local: cypress open --browser chrome -e tags="@stable_test and @pr and @school_api_test",environmentName=local
scripts.cy:gui:stable:pr:staging:local: cypress open --browser chrome -e tags="@stable_test and @pr and @staging_test",environmentName=staging
scripts.cy:headless:stable:regression_test:prio_: cypress run --browser chrome -e tags="@stable_test and @regression_test and @school_api_test and @prio_0_dev",environmentName=local
cypress run --browser chrome -e tags="@regression_test and @stable_test and @staging_test and @prio_0_staging",environmentName=staging
scripts.cy:headless:stable:pr:school_api_test:lo: cypress run --browser chrome -e tags="@stable_test and @pr and @school_api_test",environmentName=local
scripts.cy:headless:stable:pr:staging:local: cypress run --browser chrome -e tags="@pr and @stable_test and @staging_test",environmentName=staging
